name: Brute knight character pack
description: A large collection of hulking brute knights. The pack includes six pre made knights and a load of character map pieces for crafting more using the included Spriter file. The animations come in keyframe format, Each keyframe is around 800px wide. but you can export keyframes up to 2500px without losing resolution using thee spriter files. The included animations are idle, walk, run, jump, whack, smash , stab, defend, hurt, confused, die throw
